A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a Star Wars fan who just spent a couple days watching the past 7 movies\, I was extremely excited for this and had high expectations after TFAW. However this movie was extremely disappointing and an utter disgrace to Luke. Also why is Snoke a character? I was extremely excited to see who he was and how he was so powerful\, but he does absolutely nothing. Also Rose and Fin’s story line is downright useless and I hope Rose doesn’t come back. BB 8 is probably the best character in Star Wars now and it is extremely sad. Way to ruin a lot of people’s nights with this one Johnson\, thanks a lot. Hopefully they make episode 9 feel like Star Wars again....
